title: Typefaces similar to Akzidenz-Grotesk Condensed
content:
I'm looking for a typeface similar to Akzidenz-Grotesk Condensed. It \*must\* have expert kerning, small caps, and italics all the way around. It will be used between 8 and 18 point (approx) if that matters.   
   
Any suggestions?   
   
Thanks
author: emp
